content: On August 12, Yueyang Airport put up a sign prohibiting Tesla cars from entering. This sparked widespread discussion among netizens. The staff said, "Now many units prohibit Tesla cars from entering."

content: The family of a Dalian No. 407 bus driver posted a notice at the bus station, accusing the bus company of forcing the driver to work intensively, leaving home at 5 a.m. every day and returning home at 8 p.m., completely ignoring the driver's fatigue driving and the safety of passengers' lives.

On August 11, the Xi'an Culture and Tourism Bureau responded that it had not received or issued a notice to cancel all subsequent large-scale performances. It said it was unclear why the Spring Wave Music Festival was canceled.
On August 15, Rene Liu's Xi'an concert was canceled.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Today, a document was leaked in which the Nanchang County Housing Security Center sent a letter requesting real estate companies to dismiss teams that were lagging behind in the sales process.
The document requires real estate companies to adjust their marketing strategies and increase marketing efforts before July 15, interview, adjust and dismiss marketing teams that are not doing well in sales.
On August 15, the Nanchang County Housing Security Center confirmed to reporters that it had indeed sent a relevant work letter before.
